sha්ri lankawa saha amarikawa “gambauru saha dirghakalina pa්rajathantha්rika sampa්radayan saha podu watinakam walin bandi sitina” bawa sandahan karamin janadhipathi maitha්ripala sirisena ta්rampta subapathum paniwudayak yawa atha. 2015 janawariye thaman balayata pathwu than patan, derata athara deshapalana bandim “shakthimath” wi athi bawath, ta්ramp samaga ekwa “ratawal deka athara sambandhathawaya thawath sawimath kara ganimata haki wanu athayi” balaporoththu wana bawath sirisena pawasuweya.

mese balapathra gasthuwalin thora methanol aanayanaya kirima sandaha labadi athi awasthawa waradi lesa bhawitha karamin nithyanukula nowana ayurin mathpan nishpadanaya kirima sandaha ethanol aanayanaya karana awastha pilibandawa wartha wu heyin mese paniya nowana sprithu aanayanayada mudal ha janamadhya amathyanshaya wisin surabadu panathata yatath kara, balapathra gasthuwakda samanga thoga litar 01k sandaha ru.25ka aanayanika sura baddak panawa thibe.

jathyanthara kantha dinayata samagami kantha nishpadana pradarshanaya ha alewi pola - 2018 shri lanka kantha karyanshaye liyapadinchi kantha karya sanwidhana wala samajikawange aarthika ha samajiya thaththwaya nanga situwima wenuwen owunge nishpadanawala gunathmaka bhawaya wardhanaya sandaha kanthawan diriganwimath , nirmana ha nishpadana sandaha pradarshanathmaka welanda palak athi kirimath , wyawasayakathwa athdakim huwamaruwa aramunu kara ganimin chakriya naya , shilpiya puhunuwa ha wandambau kantha wadasatahana yatathe aadayam uthpadanaya yana wadasatahan men ma wenath wiwidha wadasatahan osse bala ganwana lada wyawasayikawange nishpadanayangen samanwitha wa jathyanthara kantha dinayata samagamiwa kantha nishpadana pradarshanaya ha alewi pola polonnaruwa disthrikkaye di welanda kuti 90kin yukthawa wyawasayikawan 100yakage sahabhagithwayen mema wada satahana kriyathmaka kirimata apekshitha ya.
habayi niruwath wima diya wimama nemeyi.
